website_summaries.verdict: It has its positives, including the air purge system, but for the price, the quality and warranty could be improved.
pros: Features an air purge system for easy starts
Has a low-noise motor and adjustable rear handle
Doesn't vibrate too much, so it's easy to handle
cons: It feels somewhat heavy and awkward to use, and the power is a bit lacking compared to other models

customer_reviews.title: ... not very encouraging for prospective buyers but those with good experiences were more recent and as is true with ...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews that were not very encouraging for prospective buyers but those with good experiences were more recent and as is true with any purchase, I took a chance. I have two other Husqvarna products that I purchased within the last year and found them to be reliable and easy to start. So far, this has worked quite well. It's much lighter than the previous hedge clipper I used, and the blade is much sharper. Reminder; if you want to extend the warranty on this unit for an additional year, be sure to purchase the Husqvana premixed fuel or the motor oil at the same time you buy the unit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Klear Image Guy

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait to buy this?
customer_reviews.text: This is the right tool for hedges, bushes, and evergreen bushes. I've been running an ion battery trimmer for 5 years. Having this gas powered trimmer is night and day. So much easier to use. Does much more. Smoother, more powerful, cuts much nicer. I can't believe I waited so long. My yard looks better already and in half the time. As for this specific product, it has ran really well so far. Heavier than a battery trimmer. You might need to rest your forearms more often, but it cuts really smooth. It starts up fast every time. I enjoy trimming with it, whereas trimming used to be a dreaded task.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: HUSQVARNA  A NAME THAT STANDS OUT
customer_reviews.text: WELL THIS PARTICULAR TRIMMER WAS NOT WHAT I EXPECTED FROM HUSQVARNA. IT DIDN'T SEEM TO WANT TO CUT MY HEDGES AS I WOULD LIKE. IT WOULD START UP BUT IT DID NOT WANT TO DO ANY DEEP CUTTING. SO I BELIEVE THAT THIS ONE WAS ONE OF DEFECT AND NOT OF QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: George Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Unable to get guard off!
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to remove the blade guard, no matter what I tried. I was so frustrated with the lack of how to start the first time and how to remove the blade guard. Apparently, this is a common problem. I did manage to get the guard off but using a wide flat object at the base of the blade guard underneath to pry it off. I got this idea from an online video. With so many folks having this issue Husqvarna needs to do something about it. I will adjust my rating once I get a chance to use the trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Percy R Bloodworth

customer_reviews.title: Best hedge trimmer out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great hedge trimmer. Quick shipment, ready to start up just a few minutes out of the box. No trouble starting, great trimming bushes and vines. Trimmer is easy to handle, not to heavy and does a fabulous job. This hedger is a work horse and we look forward to many years of service. I would most definitely recommend and would purchase again through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mytweedybear

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting ability
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this item. It cuts great..but it is not easy to start and keep running..it is not as light as they say especially when doing a large job that takes awhile. I love the build of this I just wish it was more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Kodge

customer_reviews.title: Carburetor not adjusted properly out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The clippers worked for about 10 minutes, then began to stall whenever I pressed the throttle. I increased the idle speed, but that didn't fix it. The problem seems to be the fuel/air mixture....which CANNOT BE ADJUSTED without a special tool. (This is apparently a mandate from the EPA, as they don't want people monkeying with their 2-stroke engines increasing emissions.) This is incredibly frustrating. A brand new piece of equipment is useless unless I pay someone to adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: John Shade

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and definitely lighter than previous models. But it still is pretty heavy for repeated lifting to trim high hedges. Runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Jake McKay

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: It didn't run well right out of my he box and the carb adjustments need a special tool. I have always had good luck with Husky equipment but this does not live up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shrubs looking great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great and easy to use had holly bushes that were overgrown and would have taken hours to trim with a manual cutter. The job was done in about 30 minutes with the power trimmer. Loved the handle and could turn it to cut easier. Starts easy runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Product Failure
customer_reviews.text: Used the trimmer 3 times and on the 4th time it would run and stop. Contacted seller who referred me to the manufacturer. Manufacturer referred me to authorized dealer for service. It's been several weeks now and it's still not fixed. Very disappointed in product durability and lack of interest by dealer and manufacturer to respond and resolve my issue. Jerry Severson
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Severson

customer_reviews.title: Defective or simply poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hedge trimmer for yard use (1-2x a month). After third (light) use MOTOR DIED. Floods automatically upon start. Gas replaced, just to be sure, with no luck. Either the quality of this product has become so poor that it should be avoided altogether (along with the seller, an LLC) or this particular item was defective. This should have been an 8-10 year purchase. My 12 year old echo and stihl tools still start easily and run great. Beware - Husqvarna seems to have dropped the ball on its production. Did it just license out its name to some low quality producer? I am disappointed and surprised. Will attempt return.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brannen

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Is A Beast!
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved into a house that the shrubbery had been neglected for several years and needed a trimmer that could take on a jungle. This beast did not disappoint! And surprisingly lightweight to be so heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starting and running problems.
customer_reviews.text: As reported by other buyers I had problems starting the trimmer right out of the box. Once it did start then I had problems keeping it running. Tried adjusting the idling screw but no help. I was disappointed with this purchase and promptly returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Airmaint

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and cuts through 3/4 inch limbs good. Just sounds like it is not running fast if you are use to noise of a chainsaw.
customer_reviews.author: Remi

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Well-made piece of equipment and easy to use. Very powerful and cuts through most limbs that one would encounter in a hedge or Bush.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start handles great with plenty of power and reach. Ours started up right out of the box and runs great.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Russell

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy duty trimmer and is a little heavy, but is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B York

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Light gor its size and cutting length
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Light gor its size and cutting length. Starts easy. Exhaust blows away from operator. Rotating handle works great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: LEARN FROM MY MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your money on this piece of junk. The 1st time I started it ran less than 3 minutes bogging down for all 3 minutes now it wont start at all. I called husqvarna and I they want me to pay to have it repaired after a whole 3 minutes of use! Do not waste your money on this, buy a sthil or echo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheap hedge trimmer and it lasted about 10 minutes before it broke, non-repairable. I then purchased a HV handout arrived in about a week. It works great and appears very heavy duty. I used it once and was most impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Reifschneider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand and the device, replaced my 18" and knock out large jobs in a flash
customer_reviews.author: texasfan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Moderately powerful. Quick. Easy to operate. Takes the work out of hedge trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Great product and arrived less than 24 hours from placing order. Recommmend having a carb adjusting to to tune.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Collins

customer_reviews.title: Only used trimmer once and it cut my hedges with ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used trimmer once and it cut my hedges with ease. Not sure if it was because it was new and blades were sharp or not, know soon.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN BRODIE

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice trimmer. It won't get up to speed without lugging down though. Almost useless.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Adkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and loves how its identical to my husband's. Has great sound. It hasn't failed us yet!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Starts easily every time and does an excellent job as intended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hedge trimmer for my landscaping business. I use it several days a week and it's a work horse. Starts easily every time and does an excellent job as intended. Highly recommend this trimmer !
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes it a lot. Can't go wrong with Husqvarna products.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and is making my life so much easier ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and is making my life so much easier in keeping back mother nature. Nice design and easy to start and operate, just like my Husqvarna leaf blower (like a 747!). I am committed to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nepi

customer_reviews.title: would not run. had to take it to local ...
customer_reviews.text: would not run. had to take it to local dealer to get carberator adjusted. now it works great
customer_reviews.author: KAH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful well working trimmer which works effectively and has many safety features. recommend placing grease to blade system while engine off every hour or when needed
customer_reviews.author: richard clements

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to start and makes trimming the shrubs and bushes ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quickly. It is easy to start and makes trimming the shrubs and bushes so easy. The longer blade helps.
customer_reviews.author: Terri T.

customer_reviews.title: Fast reliable operation.
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far. Starts and runs great, and made quick work of task!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shinall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: So far only used this once, but I have to say it works great! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A great clipper. Powerful a little heavy, but well worth it. It’s like cutting through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Contafio

customer_reviews.title: Best trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Have used many brands, I've now converted to this. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Box beat up did not look new.
customer_reviews.text: Box was pretty beat up when I received trimmer had lots of tape holding box together not what I expected for high end trimmer. Trimmer was not damaged and worked fine .
customer_reviews.author: Bkc1963

customer_reviews.title: Blows away Echo.
customer_reviews.text: Blows away the Echo trimmer I had. It cuts branches up to one inch in diameter in short order. Smaller vines it goes through like butter. Easy start. I can't say enough good about it. Stay away from Echo products though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Tabor

customer_reviews.title: A good buy/value
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Starts easy.. Runs smoothly ... Cuts clean... Low vibration... Light weight... Easy handle rotation for reduced fatique .... Excellant value...
customer_reviews.author: JD from Knox

customer_reviews.title: Great Hedge Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Starts right up and I have no trouble trimming hedges, even thick branches nearly two inches thick. It is light and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great Husky trimmer
customer_reviews.text: fantastic trimmer. trims a lot of stuff i had to get the chainsaw out for in the past. love it. starts right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power !
customer_reviews.text: I am not the least bit disappointed. It always does what I ask, and it's good on gas. Also.. very easy to start !
customer_reviews.author: Korey K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: The Husqvarna Gas Trimmer has been a great addition to my yard care program. It starts easy, is very powerful, and has cut my trimming time in half. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the money
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer was all I expected it to be. The cutting bar has a much wider throat, so it can handle larger limbs. The rotating handle made trimming in all positions very easy and less taxing. The low compression allows for easy starting. However, I could not give this a 5 star since it would not run out of the box. I had to spend an additional $30 to purchase a carburetor adjusting tool. Once I received the tool, it took me about 5 minutes of tweaking to get it to run without the choke on. After that, it was smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: r glenn barefoot

customer_reviews.title: Hedges have no chance
customer_reviews.text: IF anything this might have too much power...I breezed through all of my hedges with no issues and the swiveling handle makes up and down cuts so much easier than a standard hedge cutter. Very powerful and easy to use - would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: ryedogg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start and easy use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start and easy use, great unit so far. I would have rated it a 5 but I want to use it a while longer before going out on the limb.
customer_reviews.author: doug alumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Solid, smooth easy starting every time. I am not typically a Husq fan... but this is a good machine. I paid a little more for this than I would have liked for a hedge trimmer, but worth the money. Great investment. Now if I could only get my son to use it....
customer_reviews.author: David V. Cirillo

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: My Stihl hedge trimmer clutch mechanism broke after about 8 years of heavy use. It cost too much to repair ,so I bought this Husqvarna based on reputation and reviews. Starts easier than my Sthil, and has about the same power. (I think they both use the same 21.7 cc engine) So far, am very satisfied with the Husqvarna. Time will tell how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Pa buyer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This machine is like cutting your shrubs with a chain saw; only a very good chainsaw. It worked like a charm on my tall ornamental grasses. It was very easy to start. Love Husky tools - never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mission x

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: We live live on 3 acres so needed something a little more heavy duty. My wife loves this thing! Starts easy, excellent design, cuts with ease. Another great Husqvarna power tool! A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dill

customer_reviews.title: started on 2nd pull runs great with awsum power chews through anything in its path
customer_reviews.text: blows my eco out of the water.. started on 2nd pull runs great with awsum power chews through anything in its path. well balanced lightweight machine. great price..
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to replace my old worn out hedger but my husband likes it too much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box will not run properly very poor performance. I have to feather the throttle for ...
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box will not run properly very poor performance. I have to feather the throttle for several minutes with the choke half closed to get it to run with enough RPM to engage the blades. Then if you get enough RPMs to engage do not turn it up to cut vertical; it shuts off. This is a very poor quality machine for Husqvarna to be saling. What ever happen to quality control! Do not buy this trimmer spend your money on a Poulan and at least get the job done or a Stihl if you need a serious trimmer. Again DO NOT PURCHASE THIS TRIMMER!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I like this clipper - this is my 3rd - they ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this clipper - this is my 3rd - they seem to last about 3 years - not sure why they die on me
customer_reviews.author: Karl L. McClary

customer_reviews.title: Would not run over 1/2 speed, sent back to ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not run over 1/2 speed, sent back to seller through Amazon for refund. I don't think this was normal for Husqvarna products, I have several Husqvarna tools and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

product_meta.title: Husqvarna 122HD60 21.7cc Gas 23.7-in Dual Action Hedge Trimmer 9665324-02
product_meta.description: This Husqvarna 122HD60 is a low noise, lightweight hedge trimmer with easy to use functions like Smart Start so the hedge trimmer starts quickly with minimum effort. Its auto return stop switch automatically reset to the on position for easier starting, and its Air Purge function removes air from the carburetor and fuel system for easy starting. The LowVib feature on this Husqvarna 122HD60 offers effective anti vibration dampeners to absorb vibration, reducing stress on the user's arms and hands. Plus, its cutting speed of 4,050 cut/min means more cutting with each pass for a quicker trimming job. Knife Length: 24 inches Weight: 10.8 pounds
feature_bullets: The Smart Start engine and starter have been designed so the machine starts quickly with minimum effort
A carburetor air purge system removes air from the carburetor and fuel system for easy starting
When the machine is turned off, the stop switch automatically returns to the start position for easier starting
The rear handle is adjustable to facilitate cutting the sides and top of hedges
Anti-vibration dampeners absorb vibration, reducing stress on the user's arms and hands

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars126 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
